entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
